name: Streadata.io API Gallery - SpectroCoin
description: This is a repository of spectrocoin APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: SpectroCoin
apis.description: SpectroCoin offers bitcoin exchange, bitcoin wallet, bitcoin debit card, and bitcoin payment processing services. Buy and sell bitcoins through SEPA, international and local bank transfers, or credit and debit cards.
